item.title: Basic Transfer Learning
item.description: Basic Transfer Learning Here I will demonstrate how to do basic transfer learning with tensorflow and keras. The bottom layer of our neural network will use a feature vector extracted from a much more complex convolutional neural network. 1) Imports: We use tensorflow (tf) with keras to build and train our models. We use tensorflow_hub (hub) which connects to a library of reusable machine learning model components called modules which can be viewed here: https://tfhub.
